TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SubsetMatchingMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 列舉子集比對模式的值。

span.span: Enumerates values of subset matching mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks System.Speech，在您可以建構成功辨識片語，即使其內容的子集音訊的輸入中找到的文法。In System.Speech, you can construct a grammar that successfully recognizes a phrase even though only a subset of its contents is found in the audio input. 根據預設，辨識引擎至少需要整個片語完全相符。By default, a recognition engine requires an exact match against an entire phrase. 辨識引擎也可以符合根據參數所定義的部分片語用做為引數成員或建構函式，或方法。The recognition engine can also match partial phrases according to parameters defined by a member used as an argument to the or constructors, or the method. 下列說明每的成員會影響辨識用於文法包含片語 「 汽車船之平面的卡車 」 時。The following illustrates how each of the members affects recognition when used in a grammar that contains the phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane". **OrderedSubset****OrderedSubset** 此模式表示片語的子集合將用於成功辨識該整個片語，如果下列條件成立：This mode indicates that a subset of the phrase will be used to successfully recognize the entire phrase if the following are true: - 音訊輸入已辨識片語中的一個或多個字。One or more words in the phrase are recognized in the audio input. - 這些可辨識的單字的相對順序會與片語中的相同。The relative order of those recognized words is the same as in the phrase. - 只有介系詞和文件可能包含相符的文字。Matched words may consist of only prepositions and articles. 將片語 「 汽車船之平面的卡車 」 加入至使用 OrderedSubset 文法模式會產生下列的辨識結果：Adding the phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" to a grammar using OrderedSubset mode produces the following result on recognition: |**輸入的片語****Input Phrase**|**結果****Result**| |----------------------|----------------| |「 汽車船之平面的卡車 」"a car the truck a boat that plane"|整個片語 「 汽車船之平面的卡車 」 是可辨識。The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized.| |「 汽車的船卡車 」"a car the truck a boat"|整個片語 「 汽車船之平面的卡車 」 是可辨識。The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized.| |「 汽車的平面 」"a car the that plane"|整個片語 「 汽車船之平面的卡車 」 是可辨識。The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized. 可辨識的子集不需要是原始字串的序列。A recognized subset is not required to be a sequence of the original string.| |「 汽車的卡車的平面船""a car the boat a truck that plane"|無法成功辨識。Recognition is not successful. 單字會失序。The words are out of order.| |"""a the"|整個片語 「 汽車船之平面的卡車 」 是可辨識。The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized. 介系詞和發行項可用來辨識。Prepositions and articles are used for recognition.| **OrderedSubsetContentRequired****OrderedSubsetContentRequired** 此模式表示片語的子集合將用於成功辨識該整個片語，如果下列條件成立：This mode indicates that a subset of the phrase will be used to successfully recognize the entire phrase if the following are true: - 在音訊的輸入中才能, 辨識片語中的一個或多個字，One or more words in the phrase are recognized in the audio input, and - 這些可辨識的單字的相對順序會與片語中的相同。The relative order of those recognized words is the same as in the phrase. - 相符的文字不能由只有介系詞和發行項所組成。Matched words cannot consist of only prepositions and articles. 將片語 「 汽車船之平面的卡車 」 加入至使用 OrderedSubsetContentRequired 文法模式會產生下列的辨識結果：Adding the phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" to a grammar using OrderedSubsetContentRequired mode produces the following result on recognition: |**輸入的片語****Input Phrase**|**結果****Result**| |----------------------|----------------| |「 汽車船之平面的卡車 」"a car the truck a boat that plane"|整個片語 「 汽車船之平面的卡車 」 是可辨識。The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized.| |「 汽車的船卡車 」"a car the truck a boat"|整個片語 「 汽車船之平面的卡車 」 是可辨識。The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized.| |「 汽車的平面 」"a car the that plane"|整個片語 「 汽車船之平面的卡車 」 是可辨識。The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized. 可辨識的子集不需要是原始字串的序列。A recognized subset is not required to be a sequence of the original string.| |「 汽車的卡車的平面船""a car the boat a truck that plane"|無法成功辨識。Recognition is not successful. 單字會失序。The words are out of order.| |"""a the"|無法成功辨識。Recognition is not successful. 語音輸入必須包含文章和介系詞以外的文字。Speech input must contain words other than articles and prepositions.| **序列：****Subsequence:** 此模式表示片語的子集合將用於成功辨識該整個片語，如果下列條件成立：This mode indicates that a subset of the phrase will be used to successfully recognize the entire phrase if the following are true: - 一或多個單字在片語中的音訊的輸入中識別為一連串的片語，並One or more words in the phrase are recognized in the audio input as a sequence of the phrase, and - 這些可辨識的單字的相對順序會與片語中的相同。The relative order of those recognized words is the same as in the phrase. - 只有介系詞和文件可能包含相符的文字。Matched words may consist of only prepositions and articles. 使用序列模式文法加入片語 「 汽車船之平面的卡車 」 會產生下列的辨識結果：Adding the phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" to a grammar using Subsequence mode produces the following result on recognition: |**輸入的片語****Input Phrase**|**結果****Result**| |----------------------|----------------| |「 汽車船之平面的卡車 」"a car the truck a boat that plane"|整個片語 「 汽車船之平面的卡車 」 是可辨識。The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized.| |「 汽車的船卡車 」"a car the truck a boat"|整個片語 「 汽車船之平面的卡車 」 是可辨識。The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized.| |「 汽車的平面 」"a car the that plane"|無法成功辨識。Recognition is not successful. 可辨識的子集，才能是一連串的原始字串。A recognized subset is required to be a sequence of the original string.| |「 汽車的卡車的平面船""a car the boat a truck that plane"|無法成功辨識。Recognition is not successful. 單字會失序。The words are out of order.| |"""a the"|整個片語 「 汽車船之平面的卡車 」 是可辨識。The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized. 介系詞和發行項可用來辨識。Prepositions and articles are used for recognition.| **SubsequenceContentRequired****SubsequenceContentRequired** 此模式表示片語的子集合將用於成功辨識該整個片語，如果下列條件成立：This mode indicates that a subset of the phrase will be used to successfully recognize the entire phrase if the following are true: - 比對字串中的一個或多個單字中音訊輸入辨識為一連串的片語。One or more words in the match string are recognized in the audio input as a sequence of the phrase. - 相符的文字不能由只有介系詞和發行項所組成。Matched words cannot consist of only prepositions and articles. 將片語 「 汽車船之平面的卡車 」 加入至使用 SubsequenceContentRequired 文法模式會產生下列的辨識結果：Adding the phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" to a grammar using SubsequenceContentRequired mode produces the following result on recognition: |**輸入的片語****Input Phrase**|**結果****Result**| |----------------------|----------------| |「 汽車船之平面的卡車 」"a car the truck a boat that plane"|整個片語 「 汽車船之平面的卡車 」 是可辨識。The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized.| |「 汽車的船卡車 」"a car the truck a boat"|整個片語 「 汽車船之平面的卡車 」 是可辨識。The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized.| |「 汽車的平面 」"a car the that plane"|無法成功辨識。Recognition is not successful. 可辨識的子集，才能是一連串的原始字串。A recognized subset is required to be a sequence of the original string.| |「 汽車的卡車的平面船""a car the boat a truck that plane"|無法成功辨識。Recognition is not successful. 單字會失序。The words are out of order.| |"""a the"|無法成功辨識。Recognition is not successful. 語音輸入必須包含文章和介系詞以外的文字。Speech input must contain words other than articles and prepositions.| ## Examples 以下是測試常式會產生四個物件，使用相同的片語，每個`SubsetMatchingModes`。Below is a test routine which generates four objects, using the same phrase, for each of the `SubsetMatchingModes`. 這些可以測試物件。These objects can then be tested. ``` private void CreateSubsetMatchTest() { foreach ( System.Speech.Recognition.SubsetMatchingMode mode in Enum.GetValues(typeof(System.Speech.Recognition.SubsetMatchingMode))) { GrammarBuilder gb = new GrammarBuilder("a car the truck a boat that plane",mode); Grammar grammar = new Grammar(gb); grammar.Name = mode.ToString(); grammar.Enabled=true; _recognizer.LoadGrammar(grammar); } } ```

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Speech.Recognition.SubsetMatchingMode OrderedSubset = int32(1)

span.span: Indicates that subset matching mode is **OrderedSubset**.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Speech.Recognition.SubsetMatchingMode OrderedSubsetContentRequired = int32(3)

span.span: Indicates that subset matching mode is **OrderedSubsetContentRequired**.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Speech.Recognition.SubsetMatchingMode Subsequence = int32(0)

span.span: Indicates that subset matching mode is **Subsequence**.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Speech.Recognition.SubsetMatchingMode SubsequenceContentRequired = int32(2)

span.span: Indicates that subset matching mode is **SubsequenceContentRequired**.
